product_name: Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth Vacuum Bottle - 18 fl. oz.
long_description: The compact 18 fl. oz. Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth vacuum bottle fits easily in a backpack so you can enjoy steaming hot soup or a sip of a refreshing cold beverage while you're on the go. Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps the contents hot for 12 hrs. or cold for 24 hrs. so you can warm up with cocoa or cool down with your favorite cold beverage. The inside temperature won't affect the outside temperature of the container-that means no burned fingers from hot beverages or condensation from ice-cold water. Wide-mouth opening is 2.19 in. in diameter, making it easy to fill the bottle with coffee, hot cocoa, soup or chili. Tough, food-grade 18/8 stainless steel is BPA free and resistant to bacteria and odors. Bottle fits in most car, bike and stroller cup holders and water bottle cages. Please note: Hydro Flask can't guarantee against leaks when the bottle is filled with carbonated beverages; keep the bottle upright.
short_description: The compact 18 fl. oz. Hydro Flask Wide-Mouth vacuum bottle fits easily in a backpack so you can enjoy steaming hot soup or a sip of a refreshing cold beverage while you're on the go.
